title: Why "Spider-Man: No Way Home" Might be the Most Christian Movie I've Ever Seen
description:
I finally was able to watch the new Spider-Man movie and here are my takeaways. In sum, I can't remember a more Christian movie that I have ever watched. There are definitely others that are close, but this one seems to represent a very important piece of the Christ story. Hope you enjoy and feel free to give me any pushback. 

The video I play in here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OCl_UphiIR4

My Writing: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/

There is an audio version of my videos (on all podcast platforms): https://anchor.fm/coltonkirby

About Me: https://coltonkirby.substack.com/about?utm_source=menu-dropdown
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/coltonjkirby/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/_coltonkirby
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/officialcoltonkirby/
Odysee: https://odysee.com/@ColtonKirby
